messages.subject: small sample of Kirby's writing
messages.msgSnippet: Kirby forwarded me this because I m taking him to get a money order today to buy some costume part for a friend s anime costume for an upcoming convention. He
messages.messageBody:
Kirby forwarded me this because I'm taking him to get a money order today to
buy some costume part for a friend's anime costume for an upcoming convention.

He misspelled (or rather used the wrong) "since." Other than that, it's
pretty good writing for someone who's never had any spelling, grammar or
composition lessons but learned it all from reading and writing and asking the
occasional question. And better than the technicality is that he used it for a real
reason, and he wrote something sweet to a stranger just because. He's making
the world a little better for this costumer/artist and for the friend for whom
he's buying the surprise shades.

Sandra


Subject: Re: About Vash Shades
>Date: Tue, 3 Jun 2003 01:02:45 EDT
>
>Hey.
>
>
>Yeah I am interested! How do you want payment? And what all do you need to
>know.
>
>I looked around your website and I gotta tell you. Your costumes are
>Awesome!
>I myself have been a huge Black Mage fan sense...I can remember. And when
>Final Fantasy X came out Lulu jumped to the top of the list. You most
>likely hear
>this all the time but in any case I think your Lulu Costume is one of the
>best I have ever seen.
>
>
>Well let me know how it all works.
>Kirby.
